name.ch: 獨立研究：視覺神經心理學

department.ch: 認知神經科學研究所碩士班

goal.ch: 專題探討視覺、實驗心理學與神經機制相關之認知神經科學基礎學理、議題以及最新研究發現，期望透過課程內容讓學生獲得更深入的了解，以充份發揮及應用到實際實驗與研究中。
goal.en: The independent study course will discuss the current research issues of visual cognition and its neural mechanisms. I hope students could acquire latest knowledge on these issues and know the research development in this course, then apply it to their experiments and research.

outline.ch: 探討視覺、實驗心理學與神經機制相關之認知神經科學基礎學理、議題以及最新研究發現。選修本門課的同學必須具備認知神經科學與實驗心理學的研修知識背景。
outline.en: The independent study course will discuss the current research issues of visual cognition and its neural mechanisms. Students who want to take this course need to have solid backgrounds in cognitive neuroscience and experimental psychology.

textbook.ch: The Thinking Eye, the Seeing Brain: Explorations in Visual Cognition. James T. Enns (Author).
textbook.en: The Thinking Eye, the Seeing Brain: Explorations in Visual Cognition. James T. Enns (Author).
